INFO [09-03|01:28:50.500] ðŸ˜± block lost                             number=6259651 hash=a68b83â€¦112307

Geth version: `1.8.15`
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

Could you please check the peer number for your geth node?  It seems that your geth node is not well connected to the p2p network since there are about 60K pending transactions while your node cannot fill the block every time.

If the block you mine can't be passed to other miner nodes through the p2p network within 7 blocks, then your block may become an orphan block.
The number of nodes is 50 +, no block out of the case of synchronous data are OK, only when the block out of the time like this. How do I check if the node is filled with OK?
This problem occurs in geth versions 1.8.14 and 1.8.15, but 1.8.11-1.8.13 is OK, the same device, the same environment
It is because the warning log is added in the v1.8.15. In the previous version, maybe your node lost the reward silently.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
